fields.Title of Presentation: On minimal generating sets of skein modules
fields.Description/Abstract:
We discuss the problem of constructing a generating set of links, which spans a Homfl
pty skein module of an orientable
3-manifold. This problem has been solved for cylinders over surfaces by Przytycki but not much is known for general
3-manifolds. Using Heegard decomposition it becomes a difficult combinatorial problem. We develop some ideas how the
extension of the problem to the relative case together with gluing properties of skein modules could be helpful.
